titleInfo.title: Pat Green Band at Rabbs Steakhouse

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and yellow on white) announcing the Pat Green Band with special guests Radney Foster and Shannon Lawson in the giant outdoor field of musical fun at Rabbs Steakhouse on September 30.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
